name: Compile Data

fsmDefinition: {"state":{"status":"OFF","data":{"message":"Machine is powered off."}},"transitions":{"OFF":{"set:power_on":{"status":"ON","data":{"message":"Machine power turned on."}}},"ON":{"set:power_off":{"status":"OFF","data":{"message":"Machine is powering off."}},"set-auto:idle":{"status":"IDLE","data":{"message":"Machine is now idle."}}},"IDLE":{"set:machine_start_automatic":{"status":"AUTOMATIC_RUNNING","data":{"message":"Machine is running in automatic mode."}},"set:machine_start_manual":{"status":"MANUAL_RUNNING","data":{"message":"Machine is running in manual mode."}},"set-auto:power_on":{"status":"ON","data":{"message":"Returning to ON state."}}},"AUTOMATIC_RUNNING":{"set:machine_stop":{"status":"STOPPING","data":{"message":"Machine is stopping from automatic mode."}},"set:machine_manual_mode":{"status":"MANUAL_RUNNING","data":{"message":"Switching to manual running mode."}}},"MANUAL_RUNNING":{"set:machine_stop":{"status":"STOPPING","data":{"message":"Machine is stopping from manual mode."}},"set:machine_automatic_mode":{"status":"AUTOMATIC_RUNNING","data":{"message":"Switching to automatic running mode."}}},"STOPPING":{"set-auto:machine_idle":{"status":"IDLE","data":{"message":"Machine is now idle."}}}}}

name: sending topic "toggleState" toggles between the two states
FSM for Machine Status, State, Mode
fsmDefinition: {"state":{"status":"OFF","data":{"message":"Machine is powered off."}},"transitions":{"OFF":{"set:power_on":{"status":"ON","data":{"message":"Machine power turned on."}}},"ON":{"set:power_off":{"status":"OFF","data":{"message":"Machine is powering off."}},"set-auto:machine_idle":{"status":"IDLE","data":{"message":"Machine is now idle."}}},"IDLE":{"set:machine_start_automatic":{"status":"AUTOMATIC_RUNNING","data":{"message":"Machine is running in automatic mode."}},"set:machine_start_manual":{"status":"MANUAL_RUNNING","data":{"message":"Machine is running in manual mode."}},"set-auto:power_on":{"status":"ON","data":{"message":"Returning to ON state."}}},"AUTOMATIC_RUNNING":{"set:machine_stop":{"status":"STOPPING","data":{"message":"Machine is stopping from automatic mode."}},"set:machine_start_manual":{"status":"MANUAL_RUNNING","data":{"message":"Switching to manual running mode."}}},"MANUAL_RUNNING":{"set:machine_stop":{"status":"STOPPING","data":{"message":"Machine is stopping from manual mode."}},"set:machine_start_automatic":{"status":"AUTOMATIC_RUNNING","data":{"message":"Switching to automatic running mode."}}},"STOPPING":{"set-auto:machine_idle":{"status":"IDLE","data":{"message":"Machine is now idle."}}}}}

name: FSM for Machine Status, State, Mode
fsmDefinition: {"state":{"status":"OFF","data":{"message":"Machine is powered off."}},"transitions":{"OFF":{"set:power_on":{"status":"ON","data":{"message":"Machine power turned on."}}},"ON":{"set:power_off":{"status":"OFF","data":{"message":"Machine is powering off."}},"set-auto:machine_idle":{"status":"IDLE","data":{"message":"Machine is now idle."}}},"IDLE":{"set:machine_start_automatic":{"status":"AUTOMATIC_RUNNING","data":{"message":"Machine is running in automatic mode."}},"set:machine_start_manual":{"status":"MANUAL_RUNNING","data":{"message":"Machine is running in manual mode."}},"set-auto:power_on":{"status":"ON","data":{"message":"Returning to ON state."}}},"AUTOMATIC_RUNNING":{"set:machine_stop":{"status":"STOPPING","data":{"message":"Machine is stopping from automatic mode."}},"set:machine_start_manual":{"status":"MANUAL_RUNNING","data":{"message":"Switching to manual running mode."}}},"MANUAL_RUNNING":{"set:machine_stop":{"status":"STOPPING","data":{"message":"Machine is stopping from manual mode."}},"set:machine_start_automatic":{"status":"AUTOMATIC_RUNNING","data":{"message":"Switching to automatic running mode."}}},"STOPPING":{"set-auto:machine_idle":{"status":"IDLE","data":{"message":"Machine is now idle."}}}}}
